quote_first: The plane swung around onto the take-off runway at
quote_last: , its jets revving before it moved slowly forward, then gathered speed. The wheels left the ground at 7:53.
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first:
Vimes fished out the Gooseberry as a red-hot cabbage smacked into the road behind him. “Good morning!” he said brightly to the surprised imp. “What is the time, please?”
“Er…
quote_last: , Insert Name Here,” said the imp.
title: Thud!
author: Terry Pratchett
